name: Dice Fight
description:
Dice Fight: Yahtzee™ for ninjas, and it’s FREE!

3D graphics, online multiplayer, intuitive controls, and spells and charms lead you on an exciting journey through the ancient orient! Get it now to enjoy the classic fun of throwing the dice with a hi-tech touch!

Grab the full Dice Fight fun bundle for FREE with these great features:
Online live multiplayer!
Superior graphics, animation, and user-friendly navigation!
International Leader Board!
Spells and charms to help you on your quest to victory!
Over 30 achievements to unlock!

*You need an Internet connection and a Game Center account to participate in fights.

The full version comes equipped with 15 times more FREE SPELLS than in the free version: http://itunes.apple.com/us/app/dice-fight-pro/id433138278?mt=8
